content: loop on the hook four mandala fun crochet pattern © 2020 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful 4 thread the other yarn end onto your needle and pass the needle through the loop on your hook as soon as you get the needle into the loop you can remove the hook so it s out of the way 5 weave the needle back and forth through the new piece of yarn a few times and pull it through 6 trim the ends pinch and roll the join in your fingertips to smooth it out then continue crocheting four mandala fun crochet pattern © 2020 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful finished russian join having trouble check out tamara kelly s video tutorials on her excellent crochet blog moogly she shows how to hold the yarn and hook how to make a slipknot how to make a chain and how to double_crochet http //www mooglyblog com/learn-how-to-crochet/ left-handed video http //www mooglyblog com/how-to-crochet-left-handed/ russian join video tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=9mxt2mrr894 share your blanket with #fourmandalafun on instagram please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern as long as you give design credit as four mandala fun crochet pattern by pretty peaceful not for commercial use please do not share photos o f this pattern only share the link to the pattern pdf on ravelry or etsy thank you for your support four mandala fun crochet pattern © 2020 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful
